products.name: Screenshot Builder
products.tagline: Create gorgeous images for the App Store or Google Play.
products.description: Screenshot Builder makes it easy to create beautiful, custom images for your app store page and export them in the resolutions Apple and Google require.
products.purpose: Create screenshots for the App Store
products.keywords: app screenshots,sketch to app store,app shots,launchkit,screenshots,google play screenshots,app store images,mobile screenshots,iOS screenshots,android screenshots

products.name: App Website Builder
products.tagline: Design and launch a smart website for your app
products.description: App Website Builder makes it easy and quick for any app developer to create and host a fully responsive website for their app.
products.keywords: app website builder,mobile app website template,app website design,ios landing page,app website,app landing page
products.purpose: Instantly create a smart website for your app

products.name: Review Monitor
products.tagline: App reviews delivered to your Slack and inbox
products.description: Review Monitor is a free service that checks the App Store for new reviews and posts them to your Slack channel or sends them to your email.
products.purpose: Track and share your app reviews
products.keywords: app reviews,slack,email,review tracking,app reviews in slack,app store,launchkit,review,monitor,iOS reviews

products.name: Sales Reporter
products.tagline: Daily app sales reports in Slack and your inbox
products.description: Sales Reporter tool posts your apps' daily download totals and sales summaries into your team's Slack channel and email inbox.
products.keywords: mobile download reports,app sales reports,slack,email,download summary,ios app downloads,daily app download statistics
products.purpose: Get download and revenue numbers delivered

products.name: Super User Dashboard
products.tagline: An easy way to see who absolutely loves your app.
products.description: Super Users Dashboard gives mobile teams immediate visibility into the users that open and use their app the most.
products.keywords: mobile app retention, super user, frequent app user stats, user app usage,app power users,active app users
products.purpose: See who's actually using your app the most

products.name: Cloud Config
products.tagline: Effortlessly control your app code from the cloud.
products.description: Cloud Config lets you adjust settings and features in your app, even after it's already installed on your users' devices.
